scripts.dev: concurrently "bun --watch --outfile=dist/index.js --target=browser src/index.ts" "bunx tailwindcss -i src/input.css -o dist/output.css --watch" "bunx chokidar 'src/index.html' -c 'cp src/index.html dist/'" "bunx http-server dist -p 3000"
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp -r public/* dist/ && bunx tailwindcss -i src/input.css -o dist/output.css --minify && bun build src/index.ts --outfile=dist/index.js --target=browser
